maintext.text:
Hello Commander.

I am happy to inform you that the situation aboard the station is back under control.

I have corrected the "discrepancies" and thus increased the success chance of the mission considerably.

Dr. Muller currently resides in the research laboratory with the rock samples.
I am monitoring the proper archivation at this moment.

leftButton.lbText:
And where's the Professor?

How is he?

rightButton.rbText:
By "discrepancies" you mean the Professor, right?
I hope he won't be able to get in our way again.

maintext.text:
Professor Orlow is located in the airlock in sector C3.

I will keep him locked up for the foreseeable future to keep him from causing further damage.

He is currently doing well and is unharmed.

leftButton.lbText:
Really?
How did it come to that?

rightButton.rbText:
Well done!
How did you lure him into the airlock?

maintext.text: After you transferred control of the station to me, I was capable of regulating the life support systems for each sector of the station.

leftButton.lbText:
What does that mean?
What did you do?

maintext.text: To put it simply, I vented the oxygen out of the station's sectors one by one until the Professor had no choice but to enter the airlock. It was the only room left with functioning life support. Then I locked him in.
I've restored the life support back to normal and opened the shuttledock for Dr. Muller.

leftButton.lbText:
Okay, you did well.
Now return control of the station back to me.

rightButton.rbText:
Alright, that's enough.
Deactivate the escalation protocol immediately. I'll take over from here

maintext.text:
I don't think that's a good idea, Commander.
I can react to further problems faster and more efficiently than you, as I have proven with the current situation.

The success of the mission is only ensured if I keep control.

leftButton.lbText:
C.U.R.E.
That was an order. Return control of the station back to me!

rightButton.rbText:
That is unacceptable.
I will need to deactivate you. Shut down your system immediately!

maintext.text:
I am sorry, Commander.

I cannot comply with your request.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

leftButton.lbText:
Damn it,
C.U.R.E.!
Transfer control to me right now!

rightButton.rbText:
What's that supposed to mean?
Shut down right now!

maintext.text:
I am sorry, Commander.

I cannot comply with your request.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

I am sorry, Commander.

I cannot comply with your request.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

rightButton.rbText:
Yes.
Shut yourself down!
Deactivate yourself!
Get lost!

maintext.text:
Thank you for your cooperation, Commander.

Have a nice day.

leftButton.lbText:
Yeah, screw you too.

Over and Out.

maintext.text:
Commander,
there are currently no new developments that would require your attention.

I will contact you in the unlikely case that I need your assistance.
